headline: Home Depot AI Tool Targets Pros As Valuation Looks Stretched
summary: Home Depot (NYSE:HD) has launched Material List Builder AI for professional contractors. The tool is designed to generate organized material lists for complex renovation and construction projects. Material List Builder AI connects with ordering and project planning workflows for Pro customers. For Home Depot, the Pro segment covers contractors, renovators, and trades who typically buy at larger scale and with more frequent orders than retail shoppers. Digital tools like Material List...
